name: TooDrunkToMove
description:
You have to control your very-drunk characters back to their home.

 They will keep walking forward, the only control you have is turn right or left. 

 However each time they hit the wall , the control key bindings change.  And every few seconds they  drink, the control will change as well. Try not to let them fall in to the pool.

On the top left of the screen, you can see the panel of the character.

It shows the keys of turning left and right, and also the picture of your house. Look closely, some houses may look similar.

And above the characters picture there is the timer, it tells you when the character will drink, and when he does, the key binding and move direction  will change.

The map is shown as above, your character will move toward the direction of the arrow. when you hit the wall (house or others) the key binding will change and the character will turn backward. If your character fall into the water, you lose.

The goal is to make every characters back to their home. Good Luck.

PS: You can press [esc] button to open the menu to choose different levels

PS: My name is Benyen Li, nice to join this game jam
